record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - September 11, 2007)

[Page: S11460]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business today, I ask unanimous consent the Senate now stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 9:41 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, September 12, 2007, at 9 a.m.
